scripts.build:css: npm run build:less && npm run build:autoprefix
scripts.build:fonts: npm run clean:fonts && cp vendor/fontawesome/fonts/* assets/fonts
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:fonts && npm run build:js
scripts.clean: npm run clean:app && npm run clean:fonts && npm run clean:logs && npm run clean:packages
scripts.cleanup: npm run clean:logs && npm run clean:processes
scripts.open: npm run open:atom && npm run open:chrome && npm run open:sourcetree
scripts.open:all: npm run open && npm run open:firefox && npm run open:simulator
scripts.open:dev: npm run open:atom && npm run open:chrome && npm run open:sourcetree
scripts.dev: clear && npm run cleanup && parallelshell 'npm run livereload' 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:css'
scripts.dev:watch: clear && npm run cleanup && parallelshell 'npm run livereload' 'npm run watch:css'
